attributes.action: Put forward  Pete Price for a MBE for services to Radio/ Charity and stand up.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For his work with Claire House and many radios shows.

He is the number 1 Radio Celebrity in Liverpool, and now its our turn to Give him something back.

I know I could have put more here, but there is so much, too much for just a 1000 characters.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
